displayName.japanese: 初心者バットハンター

description.english: The hunt begins! You killed 50 Bats
description.schinese: 狩猎开始！你杀死了50只蝙蝠。
description.dutch: De jacht is begonnen! Je hebt 50 vleermuizen gedood.
description.french: La chasse commence ! Vous avez tué 50 chauves-souris.
description.german: Die Jagd beginnt! Du hast 50 Fledermäuse getötet.
description.italian: La caccia è iniziata! Hai ucciso 50 pipistrelli.
description.japanese: 狩りの始まり！コウモリを50匹倒した。
description.norwegian: Jakten har begynt! Du har beseiret 50 flaggermus.
description.swedish: Jakten har börjat! Du har besegrat 50 fladdermöss.
description.portuguese: A caçada começou! Você matou 50 morcegos.

displayName.japanese: 初心者ゴーストハンター

description.english: The hunt begins! You killed 50 Ghosts
description.schinese: 狩猎开始！你杀死了50只幽灵。
description.dutch: De jacht is begonnen! Je hebt 50 geesten gedood.
description.french: La chasse commence ! Vous avez tué 50 fantômes.
description.german: Die Jagd beginnt! Du hast 50 Geister getötet.
description.italian: La caccia è iniziata! Hai ucciso 50 fantasmi.
description.japanese: 狩りの始まり！ゴーストを50体倒した。
description.norwegian: Jakten har begynt! Du har beseiret 50 spøkelser.
description.swedish: Jakten har börjat! Du har besegrat 50 spöken.
description.portuguese: A caçada começou! Você matou 50 fantasmas.

displayName.japanese: 初心者ゾンビハンター

description.english: The hunt begins! You killed 50 Zombies
description.schinese: 狩猎开始！你杀死了50只僵尸。
description.dutch: De jacht is begonnen! Je hebt 50 zombies gedood.
description.french: La chasse commence ! Vous avez tué 50 zombies.
description.german: Die Jagd beginnt! Du hast 50 Zombies getötet.
description.italian: La caccia è iniziata! Hai ucciso 50 zombie.
description.japanese: 狩りの始まり！ゾンビを50体倒した。
description.norwegian: Jakten har begynt! Du har beseiret 50 zombier.
description.swedish: Jakten har börjat! Du har besegrat 50 zombies.
description.portuguese: A caçada começou! Você matou 50 zumbis.

description.english: You've got a good eye! You killed 100 Bats
description.schinese: 眼力不错！你杀死了100只蝙蝠。
description.dutch: Scherpe ogen! Je hebt 100 vleermuizen gedood.
description.french: Œil de lynx ! Vous avez tué 100 chauves-souris.
description.german: Adlerauge! Du hast 100 Fledermäuse getötet.
description.italian: Occhio d’aquila! Hai ucciso 100 pipistrelli.
description.russian: У тебя зоркий глаз! Уничтожено 100 летучих мышей.
description.japanese: 鋭い目！コウモリを100匹倒した。
description.norwegian: Du har skarpt blikk! Du har beseiret 100 flaggermus.
description.swedish: Du har skarp syn! Du har besegrat 100 fladdermöss.
description.portuguese: Seus olhos estão afiados! Você matou 100 morcegos.

description.english: Sharp reflex! You killed 100 Ghosts
description.schinese: 反应很快！你杀死了100只幽灵。
description.dutch: Scherpe reflexen! Je hebt 100 geesten gedood.
description.french: Réflexes affûtés ! Vous avez tué 100 fantômes.
description.german: Rasante Reflexe! Du hast 100 Geister getötet.
description.italian: Riflessi fulminei! Hai ucciso 100 fantasmi.
description.japanese: 反応速度抜群！ゴーストを100体倒した。
description.polish: Twoje reakcje są niesamowite! Pokonałeś 100 duchów.
description.norwegian: Refleksene dine er utrolige! Du har beseiret 100 spøkelser.
description.swedish: Dina reflexer är otroliga! Du har besegrat 100 spöken.
description.portuguese: Reflexos rápidos! Você matou 100 fantasmas.

description.english: I see, you're more of a humans-people, you killed 100 Zombies
description.spanish: Veo, eres más de la gente humana. Has matado 100 zombis.
description.schinese: 看来你更喜欢杀人类。你杀死了100只僵尸。
description.turkish: Anlaşılan insanları daha çok seviyorsun. 100 zombi öldürdün.
description.dutch: Blijkbaar hou je meer van mensen. Je hebt 100 zombies gedood.
description.french: Apparemment, vous préférez les humains. Vous avez tué 100 zombies.
description.german: Du scheinst Menschen zu bevorzugen. Du hast 100 Zombies getötet.
description.italian: Preferisci chiaramente gli umani. Hai ucciso 100 zombie.
description.russian: Ты явно предпочитаешь людей. Уничтожено 100 зомби.
description.japanese: やっぱり人間が好き！ゾンビを100体倒した。
description.polish: Czujesz się lepiej po walce! Pokonałeś 100 zombie.
description.norwegian: Du føler deg bedre etter en kamp! Du har beseiret 100 zombier.
description.swedish: Du mår bättre efter en strid! Du har besegrat 100 zombies.
description.portuguese: Parece que você gosta mais de humanos. Você matou 100 zumbis.

displayName.japanese: バットハンターの達人

description.english: You really got a problem with Count D., huh? You killed 150 Bats!
description.spanish: ¿Tienes un problema con el Conde Drácula? Has matado 150 murciélagos.
description.schinese: 你和吸血鬼有仇吧？你杀死了150只蝙蝠！
description.turkish: Kont D. ile bir derdin mi var? 150 yarasa öldürdün!
description.dutch: Heb je een probleem met Graaf D.? Je hebt 150 vleermuizen gedood!
description.french: Vous avez un problème avec le Comte D.? Vous avez tué 150 chauves-souris !
description.german: Hast du ein Problem mit Graf D.? Du hast 150 Fledermäuse getötet!
description.italian: Hai qualche problema con il Conte D.? Hai ucciso 150 pipistrelli!
description.koreana: 드라큘라 백작과 무슨 원한이 있나? 박쥐 150마리를 처치했다!
description.russian: Что у тебя за счеты с графом Дракулой? Уничтожено 150 летучих мышей!
description.japanese: ドラキュラと何か因縁があるのか？コウモリを150匹倒した！
description.polish: Masz coś przeciwko Drakuli? Pokonałeś 150 nietoperzy!
description.norwegian: Hva har du mot Dracula? Du har beseiret 150 flaggermus!
description.swedish: Vad har du emot Dracula? Du har besegrat 150 fladdermöss!
description.portuguese: Você tem algum problema com o Conde D.? Você matou 150 morcegos!

displayName.japanese: ゴーストハンターの達人

description.english: Have you considered starting a Ghost-busting team? You killed 150 Ghosts!
description.spanish: ¿Has considerado formar un equipo de cazafantasmas? Has matado 150 fantasmas.
description.schinese: 考虑过组建一个幽灵猎人团队吗？你杀死了150只幽灵！
description.turkish: Hayalet avcılığı ekibi kurmayı düşündün mü? 150 hayalet öldürdün!
description.dutch: Heb je ooit overwogen een spookjagersteam te starten? Je hebt 150 geesten gedood!
description.french: Avez-vous déjà pensé à monter une équipe de chasseurs de fantômes ? Vous avez tué 150 fantômes !
description.german: Hast du schon mal über ein Geisterjäger-Team nachgedacht? Du hast 150 Geister getötet!
description.italian: Hai mai pensato di unirti a una squadra di acchiappafantasmi? Hai ucciso 150 fantasmi!
description.koreana: 유령 사냥꾼 팀에 들어갈 생각은? 유령 150마리를 처치했다!
description.russian: Не хочешь вступить в команду охотников? Уничтожено 150 призраков!
description.japanese: ゴーストハンターズに入りたい？ゴーストを150体倒した！
description.polish: Chcesz dołączyć do Pogromców Duchów? Pokonałeś 150 duchów!
description.norwegian: Vil du bli en Ghostbuster? Du har beseiret 150 spøkelser!
description.swedish: Vill du bli en Ghostbuster? Du har besegrat 150 spöken!
description.portuguese: Já pensou em formar uma equipe de caçadores de fantasmas? Você matou 150 fantasmas!

displayName.japanese: ゾンビハンターの達人

description.english: Savior of the humanity! You killed 150 Zombies!
description.spanish: ¡Salvador de la humanidad! Has matado 150 zombis.
description.schinese: 人类的救世主！你杀死了150只僵尸！
description.dutch: Redder van de mensheid! Je hebt 150 zombies gedood!
description.french: Sauveur de l'humanité ! Vous avez tué 150 zombies !
description.german: Retter der Menschheit! Du hast 150 Zombies getötet!
description.italian: Salvatore dell’umanità! Hai ucciso 150 zombie!
description.japanese: 人類の救世主！ゾンビを150体倒した！
description.norwegian: Menneskehetens frelser! Du har beseiret 150 zombier!
description.swedish: Mänsklighetens räddare! Du har besegrat 150 zombies!
description.portuguese: Salvador da humanidade! Você matou 150 zumbis!

description.english: You collected 10 Health boosts
description.schinese: 你收集了10个健康增益。
description.dutch: Je hebt 10 gezondheidsboosts verzameld.
description.french: Vous avez collecté 10 boosts de santé.
description.german: Du hast 10 Gesundheits-Boosts gesammelt.
description.italian: Hai raccolto 10 potenziamenti di salute.
description.japanese: 回復アイテムを10個獲得した。
description.norwegian: Du har samlet 10 helbredende gjenstander.
description.swedish: Du har samlat 10 helande föremål.
description.portuguese: Você coletou 10 itens de cura.

description.english: You collected 10 Jump boosts
description.schinese: 你收集了10个跳跃增益。
description.dutch: Je hebt 10 springboosts verzameld.
description.french: Vous avez collecté 10 boosts de saut.
description.german: Du hast 10 Sprung-Boosts gesammelt.
description.italian: Hai raccolto 10 potenziamenti di salto.
description.japanese: ジャンプ強化アイテムを10個獲得した。
description.norwegian: Du har samlet 10 hoppforbedrende gjenstander.
description.swedish: Du har samlat 10 hoppförbättrande föremål.
description.portuguese: Você coletou 10 itens de salto.

description.english: You collected 10 Speed boosts
description.schinese: 你收集了10个速度增益。
description.dutch: Je hebt 10 snelheidsboosts verzameld.
description.french: Vous avez collecté 10 boosts de vitesse.
description.german: Du hast 10 Geschwindigkeits-Boosts gesammelt.
description.italian: Hai raccolto 10 potenziamenti di velocità.
description.japanese: スピードアップアイテムを10個獲得した。
description.norwegian: Du har samlet 10 fartsforbedrende gjenstander.
description.swedish: Du har samlat 10 hastighetsförbättrande föremål.
description.portuguese: Você coletou 10 itens de velocidade.

description.english: You collected 10 Score boosts
description.schinese: 你收集了10个得分增益。
description.dutch: Je hebt 10 scoreboosts verzameld.
description.french: Vous avez collecté 10 boosts de score.
description.german: Du hast 10 Punkte-Boosts gesammelt.
description.italian: Hai raccolto 10 potenziamenti di punti.
description.japanese: スコアアップアイテムを10個獲得した。
description.norwegian: Du har samlet 10 poengforbedrende gjenstander.
description.swedish: Du har samlat 10 poängförbättrande föremål.
description.portuguese: Você coletou 10 itens de pontuação.

description.english: You collected 15 Score boosts
description.schinese: 你收集了15个得分增益。

description.french: Vous avez collecté 15 boosts de score.
description.german: Du hast 15 Punkte-Boosts gesammelt.

description.swedish: Du har samlat 15 poängförbättrande föremål.
description.portuguese: Você coletou 15 itens de pontuação.

description.english: The hunt never ends! You collected 25 Health boosts!
description.spanish: ¡La caza nunca termina! Has recolectado 25 potenciadores de salud.
description.schinese: 狩猎永不止息！你收集了25个健康增益！
description.turkish: Av asla bitmez! 25 sağlık desteği topladın!
description.dutch: De jacht stopt nooit! Je hebt 25 gezondheidsboosts verzameld!
description.french: La chasse ne s'arrête jamais ! Vous avez collecté 25 boosts de santé !
description.german: Die Jagd endet nie! Du hast 25 Gesundheits-Boosts gesammelt!
description.italian: La caccia non finisce mai! Hai raccolto 25 potenziamenti di salute!
description.koreana: 사냥은 끝나지 않는다! 체력 회복 아이템을 25개 획득했다!
description.russian: Охота не закончена! Получено 25 предметов для восстановления здоровья!
description.japanese: まだまだ狩りは終わらない！回復アイテムを25個獲得した！
description.norwegian: Jakten fortsetter! Du har samlet 25 helbredende gjenstander!
description.swedish: Jakten fortsätter! Du har samlat 25 helande föremål!
description.portuguese: A caça nunca termina! Você coletou 25 itens de cura!

description.english: Aspiring Martian Hunter! You collected 25 Jump boosts!
description.spanish: ¡Cazador marciano en entrenamiento! Has recolectado 25 potenciadores de salto.
description.schinese: 未来的火星猎人！你收集了25个跳跃增益！
description.turkish: Geleceğin Mars avcısı! 25 zıplama desteği topladın!
description.dutch: Toekomstige Mars-jager! Je hebt 25 springboosts verzameld!
description.french: Futur chasseur martien ! Vous avez collecté 25 boosts de saut !
description.german: Zukünftiger Mars-Jäger! Du hast 25 Sprung-Boosts gesammelt!
description.italian: Futuro cacciatore su Marte! Hai raccolto 25 potenziamenti di salto!
description.koreana: 화성에서도 사냥할 준비 완료! 점프 강화 아이템을 25개 획득했다!
description.russian: Готов к охоте на Марсе! Получено 25 предметов для увеличения прыжка!
description.japanese: 火星でも狩れる？ジャンプ強化アイテムを25個獲得した！
description.polish: Potrafisz polować nawet na Marsie? Zebrałeś 25 przedmiotów zwiększających skok!
description.norwegian: Kan du jakte på Mars? Du har samlet 25 hoppforbedrende gjenstander!
description.swedish: Kan du jaga på Mars? Du har samlat 25 hoppförbättrande föremål!
description.portuguese: Você é o caçador de Marte do futuro! Você coletou 25 itens de salto!

displayName.japanese: 疲れ知らずのハンター

description.english: Got somewhere to be? You collected 25 Speed boosts!
description.spanish: ¿Tienes prisa? Has recolectado 25 potenciadores de velocidad.
description.schinese: 你赶时间吗？你收集了25个速度增益！
description.turkish: Bir yere mi yetişiyorsun? 25 hız desteği topladın!
description.dutch: Heb je haast? Je hebt 25 snelheidsboosts verzameld!
description.french: Pressé ? Vous avez collecté 25 boosts de vitesse !
description.german: In Eile? Du hast 25 Geschwindigkeits-Boosts gesammelt!
description.italian: Hai fretta? Hai raccolto 25 potenziamenti di velocità!
description.russian: Спешишь? Получено 25 предметов для увеличения скорости!
description.japanese: 急いでる？スピードアップアイテムを25個獲得した！
description.polish: Masz niesamowitą szybkość! Zebrałeś 25 przedmiotów zwiększających prędkość!
description.norwegian: Du er lynrask! Du har samlet 25 fartsforbedrende gjenstander!
description.swedish: Du är blixtsnabb! Du har samlat 25 hastighetsförbättrande föremål!
description.portuguese: Você está com pressa? Você coletou 25 itens de velocidade!

description.english: Go big or go home. You collected 25 Score boosts!
description.spanish: Juega a lo grande o no juegues. Has recolectado 25 potenciadores de puntuación.
description.schinese: 要么大玩特玩，要么什么都不玩。你收集了25个得分增益！
description.turkish: Ya büyük oynarsın ya da hiç oynamazsın. 25 skor desteği topladın!
description.dutch: Ga groot of ga naar huis. Je hebt 25 scoreboosts verzameld!
description.french: Voir grand ou rentrer chez soi. Vous avez collecté 25 boosts de score !
description.german: Denk groß oder geh nach Hause. Du hast 25 Punkte-Boosts gesammelt!
description.italian: Pensa in grande o resta a casa. Hai raccolto 25 potenziamenti di punti!
description.koreana: 크게 생각하라! 포인트 강화 아이템을 25개 획득했다!
description.russian: Думай масштабно! Получено 25 предметов для увеличения очков!
description.japanese: もっと大きく考えよう！スコアアップアイテムを25個獲得した！
description.polish: Myśl na wielką skalę! Zebrałeś 25 przedmiotów zwiększających punkty!
description.norwegian: Tenk stort! Du har samlet 25 poengforbedrende gjenstander!
description.swedish: Tänk stort! Du har samlat 25 poängförbättrande föremål!
description.portuguese: Ou você joga grande, ou não joga. Você coletou 25 itens de pontuação!

displayName.schinese: 欢迎加入霰弹枪俱乐部！
displayName.french: Bienvenue au Club du Fusil à Pompe !
displayName.italian: Benvenuto nel club dei fucili a pompa!
displayName.japanese: ショットガンクラブへようこそ！

description.english: You collected 5 Shotguns
description.schinese: 你收集了5把霰弹枪。
description.dutch: Je hebt 5 shotguns verzameld.
description.french: Vous avez collecté 5 fusils à pompe.
description.german: Du hast 5 Schrotflinten gesammelt.
description.italian: Hai raccolto 5 fucili a pompa.
description.japanese: ショットガンを5丁獲得した。
description.norwegian: Du har samlet 5 haglegevær.
description.swedish: Du har samlat 5 hagelgevär.
description.portuguese: Você coletou 5 espingardas.

description.english: That satisfying ping means you're doing it right! You collected 5 Rifles
description.spanish: ¡Ese satisfactorio ping significa que lo estás haciendo bien! Has recolectado 5 rifles.
description.schinese: 那声音真好听，说明你做对了！你收集了5把步枪。
description.turkish: O tatmin edici ‘ping’ sesi işini doğru yaptığını gösterir! 5 tüfek topladın.
description.dutch: Dat bevredigende 'ping'-geluid betekent dat je het goed doet! Je hebt 5 geweren verzameld.
description.french: Ce 'ping' satisfaisant signifie que vous faites du bon travail ! Vous avez collecté 5 fusils.
description.german: Dieses befriedigende 'Ping' bedeutet, dass du gute Arbeit leistest! Du hast 5 Gewehre gesammelt.
description.italian: Quel suono soddisfacente significa che stai facendo un buon lavoro! Hai raccolto 5 fucili di precisione.
description.koreana: 그 만족스러운 소리가 성공의 증거! 저격소총 5정을 획득했다.
description.russian: Этот звук означает успех! Получено 5 снайперских винтовок.
description.japanese: この音が成功の証！スナイパーライフルを5丁獲得した。
description.polish: Masz celne oko! Zebrałeś 5 karabinów snajperskich.
description.norwegian: Du har et skarpt øye! Du har samlet 5 snikskytterrifler.
description.swedish: Du har ett skarpt öga! Du har samlat 5 prickskyttegevär.
description.portuguese: Aquele som satisfatório de ‘ping’ significa que você fez o trabalho certo! Você coletou 5 rifles.

description.english: You have two shells and no patience. You collected 5 Double Shotguns!
description.spanish: ¡Tienes dos cartuchos y no tienes paciencia! Has recolectado 5 escopetas dobles.
description.schinese: 你有两颗子弹，耐心没多少。你收集了5把双管霰弹枪！
description.turkish: İki atışın var ve sabrın yok! 5 çifte tüfek topladın.
description.dutch: Je hebt twee schoten en geen geduld! Je hebt 5 dubbele shotguns verzameld.
description.french: Vous avez deux coups et aucune patience ! Vous avez collecté 5 doubles fusils à pompe.
description.german: Du hast zwei Schüsse und keine Geduld! Du hast 5 Doppelschrotflinten gesammelt.
description.italian: Hai due colpi e zero pazienza! Hai raccolto 5 doppiette.
description.koreana: 두 발이면 충분하지! 더블 배럴 샷건 5정을 획득했다.
description.russian: Двух стволов достаточно! Получено 5 двуствольных дробовиков.
description.japanese: 2つの銃口があれば十分！ダブルバレルショットガンを5丁獲得した。
description.polish: Z podwójną lufą nie ma problemu! Zebrałeś 5 dubeltówek.
description.norwegian: Ikke noe problem med dobbelt løp! Du har samlet 5 dobbeltløpede haglegevær.
description.swedish: Inga problem med dubbla pipor! Du har samlat 5 dubbelpipiga hagelgevär.
description.portuguese: Você tem dois disparos e paciência zero! Você coletou 5 espingardas de dois tiros.

description.english: Who's aiming? Precision is overrated. You collected 5 SMG's
description.spanish: ¿Quién necesita apuntar? La precisión es sobrevalorada. Has recolectado 5 SMGs.
description.schinese: 谁还会瞄准呢？精准度不重要。你收集了5把冲锋枪。
description.turkish: Kim nişan alır ki? Tam isabete gerek yok. 5 SMG topladın.
description.dutch: Wie richt er nog? Nauwkeurigheid is overschat. Je hebt 5 SMG's verzameld.
description.french: Qui a besoin de viser ? La précision est surestimée. Vous avez collecté 5 mitraillettes.
description.german: Wer braucht Zielen? Präzision ist überbewertet. Du hast 5 Maschinenpistolen gesammelt.
description.italian: Chi ha bisogno di mirare? La precisione è sopravvalutata. Hai raccolto 5 mitragliette.
description.japanese: 狙いは不要！サブマシンガンを5丁獲得した。
description.polish: Nie musisz celować! Zebrałeś 5 pistoletów maszynowych.
description.norwegian: Du trenger ikke å sikte! Du har samlet 5 maskinpistoler.
description.swedish: Du behöver inte sikta! Du har samlat 5 kulsprutepistoler.
description.portuguese: Quem mira, não precisa de precisão. Você coletou 5 SMGs.

description.english: You collected 10 Shotguns
description.schinese: 你收集了10把霰弹枪。
description.dutch: Je hebt 10 shotguns verzameld.
description.french: Vous avez collecté 10 fusils à pompe.
description.german: Du hast 10 Schrotflinten gesammelt.
description.italian: Hai raccolto 10 fucili a pompa.
description.japanese: ショットガンを10丁獲得した。
description.norwegian: Du har samlet 10 haglegevær.
description.swedish: Du har samlat 10 hagelgevär.
description.portuguese: Você coletou 10 espingardas.

description.english: You collected 10 Rifles!
description.schinese: 你收集了10把步枪！
description.dutch: Je hebt 10 geweren verzameld!
description.french: Vous avez collecté 10 fusils !
description.german: Du hast 10 Gewehre gesammelt!
description.italian: Hai raccolto 10 fucili di precisione!
description.japanese: スナイパーライフルを10丁獲得した！
description.norwegian: Du har samlet 10 snikskytterrifler!
description.swedish: Du har samlat 10 prickskyttegevär!
description.portuguese: Você coletou 10 rifles!

description.english: One barrel for each of your problems. You collected 10 Double Shotguns
description.spanish: Un cartucho para cada uno de tus problemas. Has recolectado 10 escopetas dobles.
description.schinese: 每个问题一枪解决！你收集了10把双管霰弹枪。
description.turkish: Her sorunun için bir atış! 10 çifte tüfek topladın.
description.dutch: Eén loop per probleem. Je hebt 10 dubbele shotguns verzameld.
description.french: Un canon par problème. Vous avez collecté 10 doubles fusils à pompe.
description.german: Eine Kanone pro Problem. Du hast 10 Doppelschrotflinten gesammelt.
description.italian: Un'arma per ogni problema. Hai raccolto 10 doppiette.
description.koreana: 모든 문제엔 해결책이 있다. 더블 배럴 샷건 10정을 획득했다.
description.russian: На любую проблему есть решение. Получено 10 двуствольных дробовиков.
description.japanese: どんな問題も解決！ダブルバレルショットガンを10丁獲得した。
description.polish: Każdy problem ma rozwiązanie! Zebrałeś 10 dubeltówek.
description.norwegian: Hver utfordring har en løsning! Du har samlet 10 dobbeltløpede haglegevær.
description.swedish: Varje utmaning har en lösning! Du har samlat 10 dubbelpipiga hagelgevär.
description.portuguese: Cada problema tem sua solução! Você coletou 10 espingardas de dois tiros.

description.english: If it moves, you shoot. If it doesn’t, you still shoot—just in case. You collected 10 SMG's
description.spanish: Si se mueve, disparas. Si no se mueve, igual disparas… por si acaso. Has recolectado 10 SMGs.
description.schinese: 如果它动，你就射它。如果它不动……你也射它，万一呢。你收集了10把冲锋枪。
description.turkish: Eğer hareket ediyorsa vurursun. Hareket etmiyorsa… yine vurursun, ne olur ne olmaz. 10 SMG topladın.
description.dutch: Als het beweegt, schiet je. Als het niet beweegt… schiet je toch, voor de zekerheid. Je hebt 10 SMG's verzameld.
description.french: Si ça bouge, tirez. Si ça ne bouge pas… tirez quand même, au cas où. Vous avez collecté 10 mitraillettes.
description.german: Wenn es sich bewegt, schieß. Wenn nicht… schieß trotzdem, nur zur Sicherheit. Du hast 10 Maschinenpistolen gesammelt.
description.italian: Se si muove, spara. Se non si muove… spara lo stesso, per sicurezza. Hai raccolto 10 mitragliette.
description.japanese: 走りながら撃て！サブマシンガンを10丁獲得した。
description.polish: Strzelaj w biegu! Zebrałeś 10 pistoletów maszynowych.
description.norwegian: Skyt mens du løper! Du har samlet 10 maskinpistoler.
description.swedish: Skjut medan du springer! Du har samlat 10 kulsprutepistoler.
description.portuguese: Se está se movendo, você atira! Se não está… bem, atira de qualquer forma. Você coletou 10 SMGs.

description.english: You collected 15 Shotguns!
description.schinese: 你收集了15把霰弹枪！
description.dutch: Je hebt 15 shotguns verzameld!
description.french: Vous avez collecté 15 fusils à pompe !
description.german: Du hast 15 Schrotflinten gesammelt!
description.italian: Hai raccolto 15 fucili a pompa!
description.japanese: ショットガンを15丁獲得した！
description.norwegian: Du har samlet 15 haglegevær!
description.swedish: Du har samlat 15 hagelgevär!
description.portuguese: Você coletou 15 espingardas!

description.english: Efficiency at its finest. You collected 15 Rifles!
description.spanish: ¡Eficiencia en su máxima expresión! Has recolectado 15 rifles.
description.schinese: 效率的巅峰！你收集了15把步枪！
description.dutch: Efficiëntie op zijn best! Je hebt 15 geweren verzameld!
description.french: Efficacité optimale ! Vous avez collecté 15 fusils !
description.german: Maximale Effizienz! Du hast 15 Gewehre gesammelt!
description.italian: Massima efficienza! Hai raccolto 15 fucili di precisione!
description.japanese: 最強の射手！スナイパーライフルを15丁獲得した！
description.norwegian: Den beste skytteren! Du har samlet 15 snikskytterrifler!
description.swedish: Den bästa skytten! Du har samlat 15 prickskyttegevär!
description.portuguese: Eficiência no topo! Você coletou 15 rifles!

displayName.portuguese: Finalizador com Espingarda de Dois Tiros

description.english: One shot is never enough. Good thing you have two. You collected 15 Double Shotguns!
description.spanish: Un disparo nunca es suficiente. Menos mal que tienes dos. Has recolectado 15 escopetas dobles.
description.schinese: 一发子弹根本不够。幸好你有两个！你收集了15把双管霰弹枪！
description.turkish: Tek atış asla yetmez. Neyse ki sende iki tane var! 15 çifte tüfek topladın.
description.dutch: Eén schot is nooit genoeg. Gelukkig heb je er twee! Je hebt 15 dubbele shotguns verzameld!
description.french: Un seul tir ne suffit jamais. Heureusement, vous en avez deux ! Vous avez collecté 15 doubles fusils à pompe !
description.german: Ein Schuss reicht nie. Zum Glück hast du zwei! Du hast 15 Doppelschrotflinten gesammelt!
description.italian: Un colpo non basta mai. Per fortuna ne hai due! Hai raccolto 15 doppiette!
description.koreana: 한 발로는 부족하지! 더블 배럴 샷건 15정을 획득했다!
description.russian: Одного выстрела мало! Получено 15 двуствольных дробовиков!
description.japanese: 1発じゃ足りない！ダブルバレルショットガンを15丁獲得した！
description.polish: Jedna lufa to za mało! Zebrałeś 15 dubeltówek!
description.norwegian: Ett løp er ikke nok! Du har samlet 15 dobbeltløpede haglegevær!
description.swedish: En pipa är inte nog! Du har samlat 15 dubbelpipiga hagelgevär!
description.portuguese: Um disparo nunca é o suficiente. Felizmente, você tem dois! Você coletou 15 espingardas de dois tiros.

description.english: You don’t fire bullets. You unleash them. You collected 15 SMG's
description.spanish: No disparas balas. Las liberas. Has recolectado 15 SMGs.
description.schinese: 你不发射子弹，你是释放它们！你收集了15把冲锋枪。
description.turkish: Sen mermi sıkmıyorsun, onları serbest bırakıyorsun! 15 SMG topladın.
description.dutch: Je schiet geen kogels, je laat ze los! Je hebt 15 SMG's verzameld.
description.french: Vous ne tirez pas des balles, vous les relâchez ! Vous avez collecté 15 mitraillettes.
description.german: Du feuerst keine Kugeln ab, du entlässt sie! Du hast 15 Maschinenpistolen gesammelt.
description.italian: Non spari proiettili, li liberi! Hai raccolto 15 mitragliette.
description.japanese: 弾丸を解き放て！サブマシンガンを15丁獲得した。
description.norwegian: Løsne kulene! Du har samlet 15 maskinpistoler.
description.swedish: Släpp lös kulorna! Du har samlat 15 kulsprutepistoler.
description.portuguese: Você não está atirando, você está liberando balas! Você coletou 15 SMGs.
